results.text_hl: This study aimed to investigate the effects of environmental enrichment (EE) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ interventions on @DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic dysfunctions@@@, hippocampal @DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@neuronal death@@@, and hippocampal-dependent @<m>DISEASE_Memory_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008569 @@@memory impairments@@@ in high-@CHEMICAL_Fats @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005223 @@@fat@@@/high-@CHEMICAL_Sucrose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013395 @@@sucrose@@@ (HFS) diet-induced @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Benefits of Metformin in Attenuating the Hallmarks of Aging.
results.text_hl: Biological aging involves an interplay of conserved and targetable molecular mechanisms, summarized as the hallmarks of aging. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, a @CHEMICAL_Biguanides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001645 @@@biguanide@@@ that combats @<m>DISEASE_Memory_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008569 @@@age-related disorders@@@ and improves health span, is the first drug to be tested for its age-targeting effects in the large clinical trial-TAME (targeting aging by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@).
